department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程的目的是幫助學生建構基礎且廣泛的生物學概念。課程內容將包含於細胞生物學、分子生物學與人體生理學。為增加學生學習興趣，本課程也將專題介紹生物學與工程領域的結合，以實際例子介紹基礎生物學的在生活上的應用與發展。
goal.en: “With an emphasis on human biology, the goal of this course is to build up the background knowledge and basic principles of biology for students. It covers cell biology, molecular biology and human physiology. Applications of this knowledge in biotechnology and genetic technologies are explored. Learners gain an understanding of the theoretical and the scientific skills essential for further scientific developments.“

outline.ch:
“第01週 Ch1 - Introduction : Biology Today
第02週Ch2 - Essential Chemistry for Biology
第03週Ch3 - The molecules of Life
第04週Ch 4 ＆5 -The cell
第05週Ch 6 ＆ 7- Cell energy: cellular respiration and photosynthesis
第06週Ch8 -Cellular reproduction
第07週Ch 10 - The structure and function of DNA
第08週Ch 11 - How Genes are controlled
第09週Midterm exam
第10週Ch21- Animal Structure and Function
第11週Ch22-Nutrition and Digestion
第12週Ch23 Circulation and Respiration
第13週Ch25 hormone
第14週Ch26 - Reproduction and Development
第15週Ch27  I - The senses : Visual and auditory system
第16週Ch27  II- The senses : sensory and motor system
第17週 field trip
第18週 Final Exam“

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
